snippet: A former Google executive is starting an effort to help young entrepreneurs get money and mentoring to start their projects. In return, he and his investors get a claim on their future earnings.
abstract: A former Google executive is starting an effort to help young entrepreneurs get money and mentoring to start their projects. In return, he and his investors get a claim on their future earnings.

headline.main: Money, Mentoring and a Claim on the Payoff
headline.print_headline: One Part Mentor, One Part Investor
